data.eml:eml: Two new species of Exallonyx Kieffer (Hymenoptera: Proctotrupidae) from China, with a key to the Chinese species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Jingxian, He, Junhua, Xu, Zaifu (2006): Two new species of Exallonyx Kieffer (Hymenoptera: Proctotrupidae) from China, with a key to the Chinese species. Zootaxa 1142: 35-41, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.273403
